content: *this large basket is crocheted with two strands of lily sugar n cream and works up quick yarnspirations * materials lily® sugar n cream twists 56 7 g / 2 oz 4 balls size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook optional fabric stiffener worked with 2 strands of yarn held together throughout make sides in one piece make base and join to sides apply fabric stiffener and fold top edge of basket to right side to finish lily sugar n cream 2 strand basket to crochet 1 pdf modified july 1 2009 **archived versions** there are different sizes of this pattern that have been mingled over time **bernat handicrafter cotton & lily sugar n cream** **small stash baskets** includes directions for both small and medium sizes lily sugar n cream 70 9 g/2 5 oz *or* handicrafter cotton 50 g/1 75 oz small 5 ins \ 12 5 cm square x 6 ins \ 15 cm deep with top unfolded requires 2 balls lily sugar n cream or 3 balls handicrafter cotton medium 5 ins \ 12 5 cm wide x 10 ins \ 25 5 cm long x 6 ins \ 15 cm deep with top unfolded requires 3 balls lily sugar n cream or 4 balls handicrafter cotton size 3 5 mm u s e or 4 crochet hook gauge 18 single_crochet and 20 row = 4 ins \ 10 cm *note this version is worked with 1 strand of yarn * pdf modified december 11 2006 http //web archive org/web/20120106005051/http //www bernat com/home/smallstash_baskets pdf **bernat handicrafter cotton & lily sugar n cream** **large stash basket** 12 ins \ 30 5 cm square x 12 ins \ 30 5 cm deep lily sugar n cream 70 9 g/2 5 oz 11 balls *or* handicrafter cotton 50 g/1 75 oz 16 balls size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook pdf modified december 11 2006 https //web archive org/web/20120106010333/http //www bernat com/home/largestash_basket pdf **michael s version project #e06685 ** **lily® sugar n cream® crochet double stranded basket** lily® sugar n cream® confectionary colors twists 340 g / 12 oz 1 ball size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook http //web archive org/web/20090507213334/http //www michaels com/art/online/projectsheet pid=e06685 1 https //s3 amazonaws com/com yarnspirations pattern-pdfs/lily_sugarncreamweb26_cr_basket en_us pdf
